  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    private void init​(api.game_service game)
    init the game: take the elements of the game and make them visual and convert them to real objects that we can do function with/on them
    static void main​(java.lang.String[] a)  
    private static void match​(api.dw_graph_algorithms ga, java.util.List<CL_Pokemon> poks, java.util.List<CL_Agent> age)
    computes the distance of the shortest path between each agent and each pokemon in the game puts all the couples of (pokemon,agent) in the priority queue (sp) the shortest distance couple will be in the first place in the queue
    private static void moveAgents​(api.game_service game)
    moves each agent to the next node in its path to its closes pokemon according its speed
    private static void nextNode​(api.game_service game, java.util.List<CL_Pokemon> poks, java.util.List<CL_Agent> age)
    takes for each agent (=key) in the HashMap (path) the next node in its list (=value) computes the ideal time to wait to do the next move in the game
    void run()
    run the game
